original: @35a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @35a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sa ha dza aa nanta sva bh'a ba na n'a ma /
analyzed: sa ha dza aa nanta sva bh'a ba na n'a ma /
translated: Sahājānanāsvabhāvanāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba /
translated: The Nature of Coemergence

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Vajra dakini🔽The wheel, the earring, the necklace, the bracelet,

original: 'khor lo rna rgyan mgul rgyan gdu bu dang // ska rags khyod la bzang zhing rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: 'khor lo rna rgyan mgul rgyan gdu bu dang // ska rags khyod la bzang zhing rab tu mdzes //
translated: and the belt are good and very beautiful on you.

original: bo la kakko la myos ngo mtshar tshe ;
analyzed: bo la kakko la myos ngo mtshar tshe ;
translated: The bola and kakkola are intoxicating and wondrous.

original: / skad cig gcig la he ru ka dpal dgyes //
analyzed: / skad cig gcig la he ru ka dpal dgyes //
translated: In an instant, the glorious Heruka is delighted.

original: kye ho rtsa lag 'di la bdag yid dga' //
analyzed: kye ho rtsa lag 'di la bdag yid dga' //
translated: Oh, my friend, my mind is delighted by this.

original: lus ngag sems kyi ro ni gcig byas nas //
analyzed: lus ngag sems kyi ro ni gcig byas nas //
translated: Having made the taste of body, speech, and mind one,

original: nam mkhar bsdus nas rnal 'byor spas par 'gyur //
analyzed: nam mkhar bsdus nas rnal 'byor spas par 'gyur //
translated: gathered in the sky, the yogi becomes exalted.

original: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag yid dga' //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag yid dga' //
translated: Oh, my friend, the yogini, my mind is delighted by this.

original: 'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan //
analyzed: 'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan //
translated: Tearing Bhairava and Kālarātri to pieces,

original: nam mkha'i mthar thug he dang h'um sgra spro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthar thug he dang h'um sgra spro //
translated: at the end of space, the sound of “he” and “hum” is emitted.

original: phyogs bcur chang gis myas pa yi //🔽kye ho dpal ldan rnal 'byor //
analyzed: phyogs bcur chang gis myas pa yi // kye ho dpal ldan rnal 'byor //
translated: In the ten directions, the intoxicated🔽Oh, glorious yogi!

original: kye ma dpa' bo rnal 'byor med //
analyzed: kye ma dpa' bo rnal 'byor med //
translated: Oh, the hero without yoga!

original: stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin la //
analyzed: stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin la //
translated: In the nature of emptiness and compassion,

original: dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka med //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka med //
translated: Both entity and non-entity do not exist.

original: pra phab gzugs bzhin mkha' la snod //
analyzed: pra phab gzugs bzhin mkha' la snod //
translated: Like a form in a mirror, the vessel in space,

original: kye ho rnal 'byor ma dang yum lnga'i grong //
analyzed: kye ho rnal 'byor ma dang yum lnga'i grong //
translated: Ah! The town of yoginīs and five mothers,

original: a'a li dang ni k'a li nyi ma rnams //
analyzed: a'a li dang ni k'a li nyi ma rnams //
translated: The ḍākinīs and ḍākinīs, the suns,

original: mad pa rmongs pa rnams kyang gti mug che //
analyzed: mad pa rmongs pa rnams kyang gti mug che //
translated: Even the deluded are greatly confused.🔽The ḍākinīs and ḍākas, the suns and moons,

original: a'a li rnams dang k'a li nyi zla dag / med la shes min phyugs 'dra the tshom med //
analyzed: a'a li rnams dang k'a li nyi zla dag / med la shes min phyugs 'dra the tshom med //
translated: Are not known in nonexistence, like cattle, without doubt.

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnam sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnam sbyor ba yis //
translated: The union of heroes and yoginīs

original: srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod pa ngo mtshar @35b che ;
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod pa ngo mtshar @35b che ;
translated: Is the wonder of cutting the bonds of existence.

original: / kye ho rtsa lag 'di la bdag yid dga' //
analyzed: / kye ho rtsa lag 'di la bdag yid dga' //
translated: Ah! I delight in this, O kinsman.

original: lus ngag sems kyi ro ni gcig byas nas //
analyzed: lus ngag sems kyi ro ni gcig byas nas //
translated: Having made one taste of body, speech, and mind,

original: nam mkha'i khams su bsdus nas sbas par 'gyur //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su bsdus nas sbas par 'gyur //
translated: Gathering in the realm of space, one becomes hidden.

original: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' //
translated: Ah! I delight in this, O yoginīs.

original: tshad med gnas bzhi'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: tshad med gnas bzhi'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of the four immeasurable abodes,

original: bdag gis spyir yang dngos po brjod du med //
analyzed: bdag gis spyir yang dngos po brjod du med //
translated: I generally also say things are inexpressible.

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug ngo mtshar che //
translated: “O hero, lord of yogins, how wondrous!

original: ji ltar chu gting chu zla dang 'dres ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar chu gting chu zla dang 'dres ltar //
translated: Just as the water and the moon in the water are mixed,

original: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' //
translated: O yoginī, I delight in this!

original: sha rlon dam tshig rdzas 'di ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: sha rlon dam tshig rdzas 'di ngo mtshar che //
translated: “This pledge substance of fresh meat is wondrous!

original: go ku la sogs dam tshig la chags pas //
analyzed: go ku la sogs dam tshig la chags pas //
translated: By being attached to the pledge of cow’s meat and so on,

original: de yis bdag med ma ni gar mdzad do //
analyzed: de yis bdag med ma ni gar mdzad do //
translated: She dances, Nairātmyā.

original: kye ho bde gshegs rnam snang phyag rgya can //
analyzed: kye ho bde gshegs rnam snang phyag rgya can //
translated: “O Sugata, O bearer of the mudrā of Vairocana,

original: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' //
translated: O yoginī, I delight in this!

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rag bzhin zhes bya ba slob dpon kantha ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rag bzhin zhes bya ba slob dpon kantha ris mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The so-called Innate Union, composed by Master Kantharī, is complete.
